segments.text: Yes , I would like to reserve a room for next Monday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a moment , please . Let me check it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , I want a large room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right now we have a suite for 4 people , do you want to book it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's what I am looking for . I will take the room for 2 days .
segments.speaker: S2
